prompt: Text your group chat about what happened at lunch today using Gen-Alpha slang and emojis. Keep it short (50-100 words max).
response: Nahhh lunch today was actually WILD 😭💀. Jay tried to rizz up the cafeteria lady for extra fries and got instantly humbled 💅. Then Mia spilled her tray like a whole NPC, everyone went “AYO??” 😳. Mr. K popped up like a jump scare and said “that’s not very sigma” 💀. We all dipped to the courtyard like skibidi stealth mode 🥷. Anyway, fries were mid but the tea was S-tier ☕🔥.
